thread.title: Celebrity's Kate Fischer breaks her jungle cot
thread.title_full: I'm A Celebrity's Kate Fischer breaks her jungle cot | Daily Mail Online

author: Andrew Court
title: Celebrity's Kate Fischer breaks her jungle cot
text:
She's discussed her history at length as part of her time in the jungle.
But on Sunday night on I'm Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! Tziporah Malkah - formerly known as Kate Fischer - was forced to recollect some bedroom activity that she didn't anticipate recounting when her bed broke while she was sleeping in it.
As Ash Pollard and Jai Laga'aia looked on, the cot cracked and folded under her sleeping form, forcing her to admit she had broken beds before, but only as a younger, more energetic person with 'more than one person on the bed.'
Scroll down for video
How will she sleep now her bed is broken?: Kate Fischer's cot cracked and folded under her sleeping form, forcing her to admit she had broken beds before
During a daytime rest in the camp, the cameras found Jay who looked shocked as he heard the cracking sound.
'I realised that it was Tziporah's bed' he told the diary camera, 'in its dying wane. It was crying for help.'
Back in the camp the bed made another cracking sound and it was shown collapsing beneath the Sirens star.
Cracking a joke: A laughing Ash asked her as she awoke 'Sweetie, what's happening?'
A laughing Ash asked her as she awoke 'Sweetie, what's happening?' 'I don't know' she admitted as she arose.
'I had a dream that my bed was breaking, and that, yeah' she said. 'And I was falling.'
Looking down at her now-broken bed she added 'I think my bed is broken.'
Repeat offender: 'I've broken beds before in the past,' she admitted, 'but that was when I was younger and more energetic and there was more than one person on the bed'
As Ash and Jai laughed the groggy former socialite recalled the last time a bed had busted underneath her.
'I've broken beds before in the past,' she admitted, 'but that was when I was younger and more energetic and there was more than one person on the bed.'
The former fiancee of James Packer revealed last week that she has not had sex in six years.
Tell-all: Lisa and Tziporah had an intimate chat about their romances
Lying next to one another on their camp bands in the South African jungle, Lisa Curry asked Tziporah if she had a boyfriend.
'Not a boyfriend, just a friend. I haven't seen him for a long time,' Tziporah admitted, going on to state that she knew the man when she was a teenager.
She then declared that as soon as she gets a chance, she will fly to South Australia - where the mystery man lives - to meet up with him.
'I'm going to go visit, stay in a hotel within walking distance from him and see how it goes,' the star said.
She went on: 'We have discussed there may not be any physical chemistry with us, but we're getting on really well on the phone.'
Tziporah divulged more details about their phone calls, stating that, 'like teenagers', they once spent seven hours talking to one another.
In her typically-candid fashion, she then said: 'Ash [Pollard] said today, "God, I need a shag." And I said, ''Darl, I haven't had a shag in six years"'.
Former flame: Tzipporah pictured with her ex-fiance James Packer in the 1990s
